attributes.action: request prime minister to change party policy members of parliment to be removed from office for wrong doing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the undersigned request that all members of parliment are answerable for their actions to the general public
and not behind closed doors,
that all members of parliment can and will be removed from office for illegal transgretions,
inland revenue to claim back public funds 
no mp can stand for local or general election again wether removed from office by party
or previousley resigned,
